name: indexed-column-dictionary
description: A data struture which represents a table with indexing and sorting options for its columns

scripts.build: npm run clean-build && npm run copy-files
scripts.start: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/src/index.js ./.env
scripts.push: npm whoami && npm version patch && npm test && cd ./dist && npm publish && cd .. && git push --tags
scripts.pg: docker run --name some-postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=test -e POSTGRES_USER=test -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=test  -d postgres

author: Laukik
